ingredients: 5 chopped leaves cilantro, or to taste
1/2 cup reduced-fat sour cream, or as needed
recipe: Scoop 5 avocados into a large bowl. Add red onion, lime juice, cilantro, garlic, salt, pepper, and 2 dollops of sour cream. Mash with a fork until desired texture is reached. Cut remaining avocado into chunks and stir into guacamole with tomato. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
